pattern.title: Standard opening phrase for quantity property data definition

rule.context: *[(self::xs:element or self::xs:attribute) and ends-with(@name, 'Quantity') and not(xs:boolean(@abstract) eq true())] /xs:annotation/xs:documentation[1]
rule.report: Rule 7-51: The data definition for a property with a quantity representation term SHOULD begin with the standard opening phrase "An (optional adjectives) (count|number)...".
